TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IReportViewerMessages3 implements class Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.IReportViewerMessages, class Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.IReportViewerMessages2

Docs.summary: Allows applications to provide customized user interface messages.
Docs.remarks:
## Remarks You can implement the IReportViewerMessages3 interface to provide custom localization of the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewer> control user interface. This implementation is loaded by the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewer> control via a custom application setting in the Web.config configuration file with the key `ReportViewerMessages`.
For example:
``` <appSettings> <add key="ReportViewerMessages" value="MyNamespace.MyClass, APP_CODE" /> </appSettings> ```
> [!NOTE] > See [Web.config Settings for ReportViewer](../Topic/Web.config%20Settings%20for%20ReportViewer.md) for more information on Web.config file settings.
If a `null` string value for a property is returned, the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewer> control will display the original user interface string for that item.

Docs.summary: Gets the text displayed in the date and time picker when the control waits for the Web server to generate a calendar for a given month.
Gets the text of the **Cancel** link in the wait control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string TotalPages(int32 pageCount, valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.PageCountMode pageCountMode) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the string in the default toolbar that represents the total number of pages in the current report and the page count mode that is used.
